scripts.test: pnpm --filter 'mdc-syntax' run test && pnpm --filter '@mdc-syntax/*' run test
scripts.verify: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run typecheck
scripts.release: pnpm --filter 'mdc-syntax' run release && pnpm --filter '@mdc-syntax/cjk' run release && pnpm --filter '@mdc-syntax/math' run release
scripts.release:dry: pnpm --filter 'mdc-syntax' run release:dry && pnpm --filter '@mdc-syntax/cjk' run release:dry && pnpm --filter '@mdc-syntax/math' run release:dry
scripts.postinstall: pnpm --filter 'mdc-syntax' run build --stub && pnpm --filter '@mdc-syntax/*' run build --stub
